[vcvarsall.bat] Environment initialized for: 'x86_x64'

C:\Users\v-qizhou\source>d:

D:\>cd pytorch\pytorch

D:\pytorch\pytorch>set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64

D:\pytorch\pytorch>set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1

D:\pytorch\pytorch>python setup.py install

It failed since building ATen, and the following builds all failed. The log is https://gist.github.com/magic282/b08aa60ea7ebdda521282518807a3c69#file-3rd-try

Update:
attach cmake error and log of aten in folder D:\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\CMakeFiles

https://gist.github.com/magic282/b08aa60ea7ebdda521282518807a3c69#file-aten-cmake-error

https://gist.github.com/magic282/b08aa60ea7ebdda521282518807a3c69#file-aten-cmake-output

```

[vcvarsall.bat] Environment initialized for: 'x86_x64'

C:\Users\v-qizhou\source>d:

D:\>cd pytorch\pytorch

D:\pytorch\pytorch>set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64

D:\pytorch\pytorch>set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1

D:\pytorch\pytorch>python setup.py install
```

It failed since building ATen, and the following builds all failed. The log is https://gist.github.com/magic282/b08aa60ea7ebdda521282518807a3c69#file-3rd-try 

Update:
attach cmake error and log of aten in folder `D:\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\CMakeFiles`
